nodes.bodyText: Hmm, maybe my BulkExistenceEnum should have EXISTS, DOES_NOT_EXIST, INVALID_HASH, instead of True, False, Invalid.
And maybe it should be renamed FileRepoExistenceEnum and FileRepoExistenceResults
That might be better. I found the TRUE/FALSE awkward to use

Are we not going to deal with if the state changes? Also, if the FileRepo is redirected to another server in the settings, this cache needs to be invalidated. Will this PortableCase object be GC'd between Case close and open?
I just forgot to add clearing the cache to the cleanup() method. That will take care of it.
Exception containing the cause is dropped.
Exception containing the cause is dropped.
